org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.routing

Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.routing.Route

  • @Plugin(name="Route",
        category="Core",
        printObject=true,
        deferChildren=true)
public final class Route
extends Object
    A Route to an appender.
